## BraintreeInput interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BraintreeInput 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [device\_data?](./magento-api.braintreeinput.device_data.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Contains a fingerprint provided by Braintree JS SDK and should be sent with sale transaction details to the Braintree payment gateway. Should be specified only in a case if Kount (advanced fraud protection) is enabled for Braintree payment integration. |
|  [is\_active\_payment\_token\_enabler](./magento-api.braintreeinput.is_active_payment_token_enabler.md) | Scalars\['Boolean'\] | States whether an entered by a customer credit/debit card should be tokenized for later usage. Required only if Vault is enabled for Braintree payment integration. |
|  [payment\_method\_nonce](./magento-api.braintreeinput.payment_method_nonce.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The one-time payment token generated by Braintree payment gateway based on card details. Required field to make sale transaction. |
